overview: Life on Wheels tells the compelling story of a culture on the verge of a transformation. The film addresses the promises and absurdities of our auto-centric transportation system and explores possibilities for change. It examines our core values, freedom, health, safety, and happiness. It looks at our cities and our behavior. The path we choose will have a profound impact on future generations.
tagline: Transportation for a new urban century
title: Life on Wheels
